name: Duck Knights - Knights Tournament
description:
Compete with your friend in this duck-ish medieval 2 player local multiplayer action game!

It was made in scope of Extra Credits Jam with "connection"  theme which we interpreted as two knights that physically face(connect to) each other in a medieval tournament.

Use WASD for PLAYER 1
And ← → ↑ ↓ for PLAYER 2

Collect as many flying armours and horseshoes as you can, and try to evade barriers. Crashing into barriers will make you loose speed, armour and HP.

Player that has more HP, higher speed and stronger armour at the moment of contact wins a battle.

It was our first gamejam game, so hope you like it! ;)

Devs:

Programming: Floyd
Art: Legosky007
Music: @alexedev
